# NSApplication.OcclusionState

**Structure**

This constant indicates whether at least part of any window owned by this app is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
struct OcclusionState
```

## Constants

- **visible**: If set, at least part of any window owned by this app is visible.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting the Occlusion State

- **occlusionState**: The occlusion state of the app.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
